Examples¶

Making a ring¶

let N = 10
var i = linspace(-1, 1)
var (x, y) = meshgrid(x, y)
var z = x^2 + y^2
var j = argwhere(z < 0.5)
z[i] = 0

Soft thresholding¶

let N = 10
var j = linspace(-1, 1)
var (x, y) = meshgrid(j, j)
var z = x^2 + y^2
var i = abs(z) < 0.5
z[argwhere(i)] = 0
z[argwhere(1-i)] -= 0.5
